articles.title: Covid has provided an opportunity to boost TB elimination activities, says Harsh Varshan - ThePrint
articles.description: The health minister said Covid has diverted scientific attention from killer diseases like TB but also elaborated on India's strategy of turning the crisis into an opportunity.
articles.content: New Delhi: Covid-19 has derailed the painstaking efforts of decades and diverted scientific attention from killer diseases like tuberculosis with the last 10 months witnessing treatment interruptions… [+5532 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccines: 5 false myths to avoid and break away from - Times of India
